ygData.subject: Re: SoW vs. Selo's Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, Spirit of the Wolf and Selo s don t stack at ALL.  In fact, Selo s destroys Spirit of the Wolf s effect completely.  One pulse of Selo s and
ygData.messageBody:
Dalton Handy wrote:
>
> From: "Dalton Handy" <dhandy@...>
>
> Just another little note to add.. SOW and Selo's stack VERY nicely.. For
> that raw speed you just can't do without.
>

Actually, Spirit of the Wolf and Selo's don't stack at ALL. In fact,
Selo's destroys Spirit of the Wolf's effect completely. One pulse of
Selo's and everyone in your party who was in range has just had their
Selo's wiped away. Their SoW icon is still there, but the speed boost
from it is gone.

One of the things that EQ does is not let speed-related effects stack at
all. If you have SoW, and you get rooted, SoW is gone. If you are
rooted and sing Selo's or get SoW cast upon you, the root is gone.

Jyzan
